label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_015
content:
## 2024-06-10 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 107
- Active: 103
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 18
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 4

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 25
- Mid Dose: 27
- High Dose: 26
- Placebo: 29

### Immunogenicity By Group
#### Low Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 76.1
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 21.7
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 120.7
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 177.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 129.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 29.8

#### Mid Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 117.8
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 27.5
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 181.5
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 290.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 207.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 45.1

#### High Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 159.6
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 43.6
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 263.7
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 390.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 278.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 62.5

#### Placebo
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 10.1
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 5.3
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 29.9
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 41.0
- CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 23.0
- CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 8.2

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 48.3
- Erythema Percentage: 23.8
- Swelling Percentage: 15.7
- Induration Percentage: 6.7
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 27.0

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 11.9
- Fatigue Percentage: 29.5
- Myalgia Percentage: 26.1
- Headache Percentage: 15.7
- Chills Percentage: 14.7

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 7.7
- WBC (K) SD: 1.5
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 26.1
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 7.5
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 64.4
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 6.6
- Platelets (K) Mean: 218
- Platelets (K) SD: 43
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 3.8
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.9
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.4

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-1587, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1524, Description: fatigue, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose

### Events
- Vaccination day 6: 22 subjects received scheduled dose
- Immunology core lab QC report received

### Notes
- Week 15: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 107 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
